summary: Tested Landing Page and Priority Waitlist System for Creators Hive HQ. Backend: 25/25 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI tests passed. Features working: public landing page with hero/features/pricing/testimonials, waitlist signup modal with form validation, referral code generation, priority score bonus (+5 for referred users, +25 for referrers), admin waitlist dashboard with stats/analytics/leaderboard.
passed_tests: GET /api/waitlist/stats - public stats endpoint returns total count
GET /api/waitlist/creator-types - returns 11 creator types with icons
POST /api/waitlist/signup - creates new waitlist entry with position and referral code
POST /api/waitlist/signup - validation: missing email rejected
POST /api/waitlist/signup - validation: missing name rejected
POST /api/waitlist/signup - validation: missing creator_type rejected
POST /api/waitlist/signup - duplicate email rejected with appropriate message
GET /api/waitlist/position?email= - returns position, priority score, referral stats
GET /api/waitlist/position - invalid email returns 404 error
GET /api/waitlist/leaderboard - returns top referrers
Referral code generated on signup (contains name prefix + random suffix)
Signup with referral code gets +5 priority bonus (15 total vs 10 base)
Referrer gets +25 points when someone uses their code
GET /api/waitlist/referral-stats - returns referral statistics
GET /api/admin/waitlist/stats - comprehensive stats (admin auth required)
GET /api/admin/waitlist/stats - requires authentication (401/403 without token)
GET /api/admin/waitlist/signups - list signups with pagination
GET /api/admin/waitlist/signups - filtering by status and creator_type works
GET /api/admin/waitlist/signups - requires authentication
POST /api/admin/waitlist/invite - sends invitations to selected users
POST /api/admin/waitlist/invite - requires authentication
DELETE /api/admin/waitlist/{signup_id} - deletes signup successfully
DELETE /api/admin/waitlist/{signup_id} - requires authentication
DELETE /api/admin/waitlist/{signup_id} - nonexistent signup returns 404
POST /api/waitlist/signup - invalid email format rejected
Frontend: Landing page loads with hero section, features, pricing, testimonials, FAQ
Frontend: 3 'Join Waitlist' buttons with data-testid found (nav, hero, CTA)
Frontend: Waitlist modal opens with form fields (name, email, creator type, niche)
Frontend: Creator type dropdown shows all 11 types with icons
Frontend: Form validation prevents empty submission
Frontend: Successful signup shows 'You are In!' modal with position and referral code
Frontend: Success modal has Twitter, LinkedIn, Copy Link share buttons
Frontend: Admin login works with admin@hivehq.com / admin123
Frontend: Admin Waitlist Dashboard loads with stats cards (Total, Pending, Invited, Converted, Conversion Rate)
Frontend: All Signups tab shows table with name, email, type, status, priority, referrals, joined, actions
Frontend: Analytics tab shows 'Signups by Creator Type' and 'Signups by Source' charts
Frontend: Top Referrers tab shows leaderboard with rank, name, email, referrals, points
Frontend: Filtering by status works
Frontend: Refresh and Export buttons present
critical_code_review_comments: waitlist_service.py - Well-structured service with proper referral tracking and priority scoring
Referral points system: signup=10, referral_signup=25, referral_invited=50, social_share=5
Referred users get +5 bonus priority points
Referral codes are unique: NAME_PREFIX + random hex suffix
Position tracking uses priority_score for actual queue position
LandingPage.js - Clean React component with proper data-testid attributes for testing
AdminWaitlistDashboard.js - Comprehensive admin UI with tabs, filtering, pagination
SendGrid email service is MOCKED - emails are logged but not sent
seed_data_creation: Test signups created during testing. Current waitlist has 23 total signups, 21 pending, 2 invited.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing Page + Priority Waitlist feature fully tested and working. Key points: 1) Public endpoints at /api/waitlist/* (no auth), Admin endpoints at /api/admin/waitlist/* (require admin auth). 2) Landing page at /landing route, Admin dashboard at /waitlist route. 3) Referral system awards +5 to referred users, +25 to referrers. 4) SendGrid email is MOCKED - emails logged but not sent. 5) 11 creator types available. 6) Admin can invite users, delete signups, export data, view analytics.

mocked_apis.SendGrid: Email service is mocked - emails are logged but not actually sent
